text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Yaayyy～!! Yay, yaaay～!! Ehehehe…!

On our day off, I happened to spot Rice Shower 
in town, seemingly in high spirits.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Ah, big brother…! Ehehe, yeah! 
I have really exciting news to share～

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Ah, big sister…! Ehehe, yeah! 
I have really exciting news to share～

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
You see… I bought a ticket to see the theatre 
performance of "The Blue Rose of Happiness"!

If I remember correctly, "The Blue Rose of Happiness" 
is Rice Shower's favorite storybook.
choice_data_list: That's great! I'm so happy for you!
That's great! I'm so happy for you!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Yeah…!!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
You see, I usually avoid crowded areas like the theatre, 
since I often attract all kinds of trouble.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
But… well, you know… this is the stage play for 
my most favorite story! So I really want to—

text_block_list.name: Black Cat
text_block_list.text: Meeeeowww～!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Huh?!

At that moment, a sleek, black cat suddenly emerged from 
the shadows and snatched the ticket for the performance 
right from Rice Shower's pocket, then darted away!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
O-Oh no!!! M-My ticket…! 
Please come back, Mr. Black Cat～!

As Rice Shower took off after the sneaky 
black cat, I immediately joined the pursuit 
to retrieve the stolen ticket…!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Haa, haa… I'm pretty sure it went this way…!

text_block_list.name: Construction Site Worker
text_block_list.text:
Hey, hold on just a sec, miss! Sorry about that, but this 
area's off-limits 'cause of construction work.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Ehh!? A-Ah… what should we do…? That black cat went straight in here…!

text_block_list.name: Construction Site Worker
text_block_list.text:
Hmm, well… I can tell ya a way 'round, 
but it's quite the steep climb…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Ah… p-please tell me the way! 
I don't mind if it's a steep climb!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Big brother, if you get tired during the hill, please let me know! 
I'll hold your hand and pull you along…!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Big sister, if you get tired during the hill, please let me know! 
I'll hold your hand and pull you along…!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Haa, haa…… Finally, we found you…!

text_block_list.name: Black Cat
text_block_list.text: Meeoowww～!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Okay! Very… quietly……! 
It's okay, don't be afraid, Mr. Black Cat～ 
Nothing to be afraid of, okay～?

Rice Shower and I cautiously approached the black 
cat from behind… but just as it was within reach, 
I suddenly felt something slippery under my feet…!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Hyaaaa!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Owieee… Big brother, are you okay?! 
What are two banana peels doing here of all places…?!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Owieee… Big sister, are you okay?! 
What are two banana peels doing here of all places…?!

I hurriedly stood up to scan the surroundings, but the black 
cat had already vanished. With no clues as to which direction 
it had fled, we were at a loss……

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
… Big brother, I'm going to go around the neighbourhood 
asking people if they've seen a black cat nearby, okay?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
… Big sister, I'm going to go around the neighbourhood 
asking people if they've seen a black cat nearby, okay?

Rice Shower stood up with a determined expression 
and courageously approached everyone around us 
to find clues about the cat's whereabouts.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
U-Um, excuse me!! 
… Have you seen a black cat around here?

Our relentless pursuit of the cheeky black cat continued. 
It was as dusk approached that our efforts paid off, as 
we finally laid eyes on the elusive feline!

text_block_list.name: Black Cat
text_block_list.text: … Meeowww～

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
It's the black cat…! And it's still holding 
my ticket in its mouth… Thank goodness!
choice_data_list: All right, I'll get your ticket back this time!
All right, I'll get your ticket back this time!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Thank you, big brother.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Thank you, big sister.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
But it's okay…! I want to make things right by 
doing it myself. Please let me take care of it!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Well then… I'm going to go talk to it, okay?

With a determined expression on her face, Rice Shower stepped 
forward towards the bush where the black cat was lying ——

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Excuse me, Mr. Black Cat! 
P-Please don't run away. 
I have something to say!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
You see, that ticket is very important to me… 
So, please, I want you to return it to me…!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: …… Purrlease～～?

text_block_list.name: Black Cat
text_block_list.text: … Meeooow.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Ah…
… The black cat left the ticket behind!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Thank you, Mr. Black Cat…!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
I'm so glad it turned out fine… 
Thank you so much for helping me, big brother!
choice_data_list: <size=34>Good job doing your best without giving up, Rice!</size>

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
I'm so glad it turned out fine… 
Thank you so much for helping me, big sister!
choice_data_list: <size=34>Good job doing your best without giving up, Rice!</size>
<size=34>Good job doing your best without giving up, Rice!</size>

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Yeah… it's all thanks to you, big brother.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Yeah… it's all thanks to you, big sister.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
You know, when you're by my side, I feel like I can 
keep pushing forward. Like I can overcome anything, 
no matter what.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
You know, when you're by my side, I feel like I can 
keep pushing forward. Like I can overcome anything, 
no matter what.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: So, big brother, there's something I want to give you…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: So, big sister, there's something I want to give you…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: —— Please accept this ticket!!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Um, this ticket is actually… for two people. 
I wanted to use the ticket with you as 
a present, to thank you for everything.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Um, this ticket is actually… for two people. 
I wanted to use the ticket with you as 
a present, to thank you for everything.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
W-Would you like to come with me to see 
the play? Or am I asking for too much… 
Ah, of course… who do I think I am……
choice_data_list: Not at all! I'd be happy to go with you!
Not at all! I'd be happy to go with you!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
R-Really?! 
I'm so glad…!!
However, when I checked the dates for the performance…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Huh? Today?! 
… Ahhhh!!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: … You're right! W-We need to hurry～!!

And so we rushed our way to the theater, just in time 
to catch the evening performance……
